description:
As a LPA Planning Officer
  I want to provide the Planning Inspectorate with a copy of the Planning Officer's Report
  So that this can form part of the Inspectors decision.
name: Upload the Planning Officer's report

elements.name: AC1 LPA Planning Officer navigations to Upload the Planning Officer's report question

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a LPA Planning Officer is reviewing their LPA Questionnaire task list
LPA Planning Officer chooses to upload Planning Officer report
LPA Planning Officer is presented with the ability to upload the Planning Officer's report

elements.name: AC2 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'officersReport'
progress is made to the task list
Upload the Planning Officer's report subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC2 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

progress is made to the task list

elements.name: AC4 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads multiple files

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
valid multiple files 'upload-file-valid.tiff, upload-file-valid.tif, upload-file-valid.png' are uploaded for 'officersReport'
progress is made to the task list
Upload the Planning Officer's report subsection is shown as completed

a questionnaire has been created

steps.name: an appeal has been created

the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested

progress is made to the task list
Upload the Planning Officer's report subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC5 LPA Planning Officer does not upload a file and is provided with an error.

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
no file has been uploaded
progress is halted with a message to "Upload the planning officer's report or other documents and minutes"

elements.name: AC6 LPA Planning Officer selects invalid file size

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
invalid files 'upload_file_large.tiff' have been selected for 'officersReport'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload_file_large.tiff' 'is too big'

elements.name: AC7 LPA Planning Officer selects Invalid file format

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
invalid files 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' have been selected for 'officersReport'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' 'format is incorrect'

elements.name: AC8 LPA Planning Officer selects to return to previous page

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
a file has been uploaded for 'officersReport'
Back is then requested
the LPA Planning Officer is taken to the Task List
any document uploaded will not be saved

elements.name: AC9  LPA Planning Officer deletes a file prior to save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded for 'officersReport'
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC10  LPA Planning Officer deletes a file after save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded and confirmed for 'officersReport'
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC11 LPA Planning Officer returns to the completed Upload the plans used to reach the decision question

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
The question "Upload the Planning Officer's report" has been completed for 'officersReport'
the Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
the information they previously entered is still populated

elements.name: AC12 Appeal details side panel

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
the appeal details panel is displayed on the right hand side of the page

elements.name: AC13 JavaScript Disabled

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the Planning Officer's report question is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'officersReport'
progress is made to the task list
Upload the Planning Officer's report subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC14 Check your answers

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
all the mandatory questions for the questionnaire have been completed
Check your Answers is displayed
Upload the Planning Officer's report heading and the uploaded file name should be displayed

elements.name: AC15 Change answers

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a change to answer 'Upload Planning Officers report' is requested from Change your answers page
an answer is saved for 'officersReport'
progress is made to the Check Your Answers page
the updated answer is displayed
